items.title: Watch: Sunken British superyacht raised from seabed
items.description: The cause of the sinking, which killed seven of the 22 people onboard, is still under investigation.

items.title: Hurricane Erick hits Mexico resort towns killing two
items.description: Video shows communities in the affected areas dealing with flood waters and a messy clean-up.

items.title: Jihadists on 200 motorbikes storm Niger army base
items.description: At least 34 soldiers were killed in the latest attack by Islamist groups, Niger's military leaders say.

items.title: 'A choice of two evils': Young anti-regime Iranians divided over conflict
items.description: Anti-regime Iranians agree the Islamic Republic must fall, but differ on the Iran-Israel conflict and response.

items.title: Niger military leaders to nationalise uranium firm
items.description: The company is majority French-owned, while the junta wants more local control of Niger's mineral wealth.
